definition: imperial sword (giving bearer plenipotentiary powers)/imperial Chinese version of 007 licensed to kill

sentences.english: The enactment of this regulation gives us discretionary power.
sentences.chinese: 这个法规的颁布，犹如给我们配备了上方宝剑。

arrow banner of command (archaic used as symbol of military authority)/fig. instructions from one's superiors
act at one's discretion/act as one sees fit

to be bestowed, conferred, or granted by the emperor
